titleStmt.title: Calamus mensurans the measuring reed. Or, The standard of time. Containing an exact computation of the yeares of the world, from the creation thereof, to the time of the destruction of Jerusalem by the Romans. Stating also, and clearing the hid mysteries of Daniels 70. weekes, and other prophecies, the time of Herods reigne; the birth, baptisme and Passion of our Saviour, with other passages never yet extant in our English tongue. In two parts. / By John Swan.
titleStmt.author: Swan, John, d. 1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Williams, at the Signe of the Crowne in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Title page in red and black.
The second part has separate dated title page, pagination, and register.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Signe of the Crowne in Pauls Church-yard
